name: lekker-purmerend
description: Homemade food e-commerce platform for Purmerend

scripts.dev: bash scripts/dev-stop.sh && pnpm dev:infra && docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d medusa && concurrently -k -p [{name}] -n strapi,web -c magenta,green "pnpm -F @lekker/strapi dev" "pnpm -F @lekker/web dev"
scripts.dev:infra: docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d postgres redis
scripts.clean: pnpm --recursive clean && docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.yml down -v
